text:
[Verse]
City lights fade away
Stars above come out to play
Dancing in a cosmic sway
Fireflies light our way

[Verse 2]
In the night we run free
Chasing dreams just you and me
Whispers in the tall oak trees
Love like this is meant to be

[Chorus]
Oh oh under the starry skies
Oh oh catching fireflies
Oh oh no more goodbyes
Oh oh in your eyes

[Verse 3]
Moonlight shines on your face
Every moment feels like grace
Hold me tight in this space
Time stops can’t be replaced

[Bridge]
Moments come and moments go
But with you I always know
Hearts align just like a show
Love’s the only path we follow

[Chorus]
Oh oh under the starry skies
Oh oh catching fireflies
Oh oh no more goodbyes
Oh oh in your eyes
title: Starry Skies and Fireflies
